data.title: ARCTANGENT FESTIVAL 2023 Adds Chat Pile, Sikth, and Rolo Tomassi to Lineup • TotalRock
data.meta_description: ARCTANGENT FESTIVAL 2023 continues to impress with the addition of Chat Pile, Sikth, and Rolo Tomassi to their already incredible lineup. Get the latest news on this year's festival and lineup announcement.
data.text:
The ARCTANGENT FESTIVAL 2023 just got even better with the announcement of more incredible bands.

The festival is set to take place from August 16th to August 19th at Fernhill Farm, located just a short drive away from Bristol City Centre. Tickets are available here.

The latest acts to join the already impressive lineup include Oklahoma rockers Chat Pile, whose debut album “Gods Country” released mid-2022 has been receiving rave reviews. Also added to the list are UK underground music legends Sikth, Rolo Tomassi, Wuhan emo band Chinese Football, Dutch alt-pop group GGGOLDDD, LA electro noise rock band HEALTH, Long Island hardcore/mathcore superhumans Car Bomb, and Australian prog-metal band Caligula’s Horse.

The full list of bands announced on March 3rd includes Apidae, Abraham, Burial Clouds, Hammok, Hypno5e, Pothamus, Death Goals, Lys Morke, and WitchSorrow, alongside Chat Pile, Sikth, Rolo Tomassi, Chinese Football, GGGOLDDD, HEALTH, Car Bomb, and Caligula’s Horse.

These new additions join an already impressive lineup featuring headliners Heilung and Converge, as well as Deafheaven (playing ‘Sunbather’ in full as a UK exclusive), Igorrr, Swans, Empire State Bastard, Jaga Jazzist, Pigs7, Enslaved, And So I Watch You From Afar, Loathe, Cave In, Russian Circles, and more.

Festival organizer James Scarlett expressed his excitement for Chat Pile’s addition to the lineup, stating that they are “pretty much the most exciting thing going at the moment.” With such a diverse and talented lineup, ARCTANGENT FESTIVAL 2023 is shaping up to be one of the must-see events of the year for fans of heavy music.

Getting there: https://arctangent.co.uk/info/getting-to-arctangent/
